title: Himi 296
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e Kingi ta’e tupu,
‘A e ‘Eiki ko Sihova,
Ko e ‘Eiki taupotu,
Pea ‘oku ta’engata,
Ko hono ‘Afio’anga,
Ko hēvani,’i ‘olunga;
Ka ‘oku fu’u fofonga mai,
Ki māmani kotoa pē.
2.
Ka ko eni ‘a e me’a,
Ke tau fie tokanga’i,
Ko e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Ki he kakai angakovi,
Ko e angatonu ia,
Pea ‘ofa tu’unga’a pē,
Ki he kakai tō ki lalo,
‘O ne filio’i poto.
3.
Pea na’e foaki mai,
‘E he Tamai, hono ‘Alo;
Ko e hifo, fakalelei,
Ki māmani kotoa pē,
Fakafeta’i fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki hotau ‘Otua lelei,
Ke fai ma’u pē ta’etuku,
‘E he kakai kotoa pē.*
